oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Lt. John Barksdale Greer
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Lt. John Barksdale Greer, 117th MG Battn., 31st Div. and 324th MG Battn., 83rd Div. Both divisions provided repalcements to other units. Greer was from Loudon County, Tennessee and apparently his unit never saw combat. He served as the commander of American Legion Post 120 in Loudon from 1923-24. He was born in 1897 and died in 1965. See also his pistol, uniform, and diary [GWmary065-GWmary067].
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Greer, John Barksdale
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
